title: Porfolio Timeline
description:
Overview of varius former projects. Most of them small and as part of homework assignments.
 Timeline created to gain familiarity with angular, coffeescript, grunt and bower

title: Study Abroad: UC Berkeley
description: Foreign exchange at School of Information at University of California, Berkeley. Studying information organization – both on an abstract and a technical level.

title: Job Tree
description:
Visualization of job title categories.
Created as part of a information organization project

title: USGS Earthquake Map
description: Visualize all significant earthquakes within the last hour. Learning AngularJS and Leaflet

title: Flickr Flavored TODO List
description:
Simple TODO list. Fetching local background images from Flickr.com
Designed to play around with both geolocation API and Flickr API

title: CSS Animated Movie Archive
description: Creating interactivity without javascript. Created as an experiment in CSS3 capabilities.

title: WALLMOB
description:
Senior web developer at Wallmob A/S
Working primarily on backend and rest API

title: Attribute Access Benchmark
description: Script to benchmark different strategies to access attributes. Takes dynamic amount of elements. Part of Client Based Web Programming class

title: FriGuidr
description: Android app to guide people to the best Friday Bar - considering distance as well as user interests. Example of machine learning use case.

title: Klotski Game
description: Simple Klotski game. Made to be configurable using simple markup rules. Part of Client Based Web Programming class

title: Number Sorting Game
description: Sort numbers from highest to lowest. Part of Client Based Web Programming class

title: Drag and drop experiment
description: Experimenting with drag and drop in jQuery. Part of Client Based Web Programming class

title: Writing Spy Logger
description: Logging all input in a textfield - including changes and deletions. Outputting log as part of experiment. Part of Client Based Web Programming class

title: Simple Fiddler
description: Testing eval function in javascript. Part of Client Based Web Programming class

title: The missing light
description: Study of Shape Changing interfaces through lighting.

title: MSc IT Product Development, Aarhus University
description: The master’s degree is a direct extension of the bachelor described below. Especially focused on the three vertices; advanced web technologies, interaction design for pervasive computing, and physical and spatial design.

title: Lundorf.com
description: Web Developer. Implementing theme and custom modules. Setting up Amazon integration

title: Online Work Schedule
description: Planning tool for emplyees and managers in fitness centers. Created in collaboration with Sport-Solution and Seierfitness Login using admin:admin

title: Spotnight
description:
Bachelor project. Interactive table used as ambient display. 
"How can ambient lighting alleviate first encounters within a social realm of interaction in a typical nightclub setting?"

title: QuickD
description: Web-app based instant deals. Developed single page web application for back office and mobile web app for customers.

title: Winedeal.dk
description: Groupon-style deal site focused on quality wines. Ran for about a year, but never gained traction.

title: Dealsbynight.dk
description: Groupon-style deal site focused on nightlife offers. Never put in production due to a lack of collaborators.

title: BSc IT Product Development, Aarhus University
description:
The degree program is based in the Department of Computer Science and sits in the intersection between CS, design and business.
Focused on critical design thinking, practical project work, and prototyping – all alongside a very solid foundation of technical expertise.
